GrantResponse.description: Spectrum Grant response message to the CBSD.

___heartbeatDuration.description: Indicates an interval in seconds the CBSD should use between heartbeat requests.

___grantId.description: A unique ID marking a spectrum grant originated from the SAS. If error.errorCode is non-zero, this must not be present.

$eref.description: Operational parameters provided for a CBSD

___peakPower.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___palCredential.description: List of any PAL credentials which apply to this operating parameter set

___cbsdId.description: CBSD identifier as passed in the spectrum grant request.

___errorData.description: Additional error-dependent structured data containing more information about an error

___errorCode.description: An integer indicating the type of error. 0 means success (no error)

___errorMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the error.

$eref.description: Measurement report configuration parameters. Indicates to a CBSD which spectrum measurement the SAS wishes it to perform.

___grantExpireTime.description: RFC3339 date-time stamp indicating when the grant expires.

HeartbeatResponse.description: Heartbeat response provided to a CBSD

___heartbeatDuration.description: If present, the CBSD is required to use the indicated heartbeat duration in subsequent heartbeat requests.

___grantId.description: Unique designator for the grant as passed in the heartbeat request.

$eref.description: Operational parameters provided for a CBSD

___peakPower.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___palCredential.description: List of any PAL credentials which apply to this operating parameter set

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as passed in the heartbeat request.

___errorData.description: Additional error-dependent structured data containing more information about an error

___errorCode.description: An integer indicating the type of error. 0 means success (no error)

___errorMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the error.

___transmitExpireTime.description: An RFC3339-formatted string indicating the time the CBSD can transmit until.

$eref.description: Measurement report configuration parameters. Indicates to a CBSD which spectrum measurement the SAS wishes it to perform.

___grantExpireTime.description: An RFC3339-formatted string indicating the expiry time of the CBSD grant.

___operationStatusReq.description: If true, requests the CBSD to pass the operationState at the next heartbeat.

MeasReportConfig.description: Measurement report configuration parameters. Indicates to a CBSD which spectrum measurement the SAS wishes it to perform.

OperationParam.description: Operational parameters provided for a CBSD

___peakPower.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___palCredential.description: List of any PAL credentials which apply to this operating parameter set

___errorData.description: Additional error-dependent structured data containing more information about an error

___errorCode.description: An integer indicating the type of error. 0 means success (no error)

___errorMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the error.

SpectrumInquiryResponse.description: Spectrum Inquiry response returned to a CBSD

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as passed to the spectrum inquiry procedure.

___errorData.description: Additional error-dependent structured data containing more information about an error

___errorCode.description: An integer indicating the type of error. 0 means success (no error)

___errorMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the error.

___availableChannel.description: An array of available channels returned by the SAS covered by the inquiredSpectrum array in the request.

$eref.description: Response from the SAS to an inquiry for available channels within a particular frequency range. Note that the frequency ranges in the response need not correspond to the frequency ranges in the request. Instead, the provided response frequency ranges describe possible channels for the CBSD.

___ruleApplied.description: The rule applied in generating the channel availability list in this frequency range.

___channelType.description: The channel type corresponding to the associated frequency range, either PAL or GAA

AirInterface.description: Air interface parameter for a CBSD

___radioTechnology.description: Which PHY radio technology is used by the device in the 3.5GHz band

___supportedSpec.description: Description of the spec of the radio technology supported.

FreqencyRange.description: Describes a frequency range. The range is provided as a pair of numbers which describe the bounding values of the range.

___lowFrequency.description: The lower frequency of the range in Hz.

___highFrequency.description: The higher frequency of the range in Hz. Must be greater than lowFrequency.

RegistrationRequest.description: Registration parameters provided for a CBSD

___maximumGrants.description: Maximum number of grants which is supported by the device

___cbsdCategory.description: A if the device is Category A; B if it is Category B

$eref.description: Installation parameters provided for a CBSD

___antennaAzimuth.description: Heading of antenna azimuth relative to true north, provided in decimal degrees. Positive indicates easterly.

___antennaGain.description: Maximum gain in dB of the antenna along the boresight

___indoorDeployment.description: True if the equipment is installed indoors, false if outdoors

___longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___verticalAccuracy.description: A measurement in meters of the vertical accuracy of the indicated location.

___antennaDowntiltElec.description: Electrical tilt of the antenna (vertically down is positive) in decimal degrees.

___antennaBeamwidth.description: Beamwidth to 3dB points of the antenna coverage pattern, provided in decimal degrees and measured at the horizon.

___latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___height.description: Height above ground level, provided in meters

___horizontalAccuracy.description: A measurement in meters of the horizontal accuracy of the indicated location.

___antennaDowntiltMech.description: Mechanical tilt of the antenna (vertically down is positive) in decimal degrees.

___antennaModel.description: If an external antenna is used, the model of the antenna is optionally provided in this field.

___heightType.description: The reference for the height parameter. AMSL indicates the height is measured relative to mean sea level. AGL indicates the height is measured relative to local ground level at latitude, longitude.

___callSign.description: The call sign for the operator. Meaning and origin TBD

___userId.description: Unique user designator for the operator. Generation mechanism TBD

___fccId.description: The certification FCC ID for the hardware

___sensingCapability.description: List of supported sensing capabilities of the device

___cbsdSerialNumber.description: Unique identifier for the CBSD chosen by the manufacturer

$eref.description: Air interface parameter for a CBSD

___radioTechnology.description: Which PHY radio technology is used by the device in the 3.5GHz band

___supportedSpec.description: Description of the spec of the radio technology supported.

HeartbeatRequest.description: Heartbeat parameters provided by a CBSD

___grantId.description: Unique designator for the grant as returned from the spectrum grant procedure.

$eref.description: Measurement report provided by a CBSD.

___grantRenew.description: If set to true, the CBSD is asking for a renewal of the grant.

$eref.description: Operational parameters provided for a CBSD

___peakPower.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___palCredential.description: List of any PAL credentials which apply to this operating parameter set

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.

___operationState.description: If present, represents the current state of operation of the CBSD. The CBSD should include this field if requested by the SAS in a previous operationStatusReq field in a heartbeat response.

RelinquishmentRequest.description: Grant Relinquish parameters provided by a CBSD

___grantId.description: Unique designator for the grant to be relinquished. Gotten from the SAS upon grant request procedure.

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.

AvailableChannelObject.description: Response from the SAS to an inquiry for available channels within a particular frequency range. Note that the frequency ranges in the response need not correspond to the frequency ranges in the request. Instead, the provided response frequency ranges describe possible channels for the CBSD.

___ruleApplied.description: The rule applied in generating the channel availability list in this frequency range.

___channelType.description: The channel type corresponding to the associated frequency range, either PAL or GAA

GrantRequest.description: Spectrum Grant parameters provided by a CBSD

___peakPower.description: The peak operating power in dBm/MHz to be used by the CBSD within this operating parameter set

___palCredential.description: List of any PAL credentials which apply to this operating parameter set

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.

DeregistrationRequest.description: Deregistration parameters provided by a CBSD

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.

MeasReport.description: Measurement report provided by a CBSD.

SpectrumInquiryRequest.description: Spectrum Inquiry parameters provided by a CBSD

___inquiredSpectrum.description: Description of the frequency range(s) the CBSD is inquiring about.

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as returned from the registration procedure.

___palCredential.description: If the CBSD has PAL rights, they may be communicated to the SAS here.

DeregistrationResponse.description: Deregistration response provided to a CBSD

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as provided in the deregistration request.

___errorData.description: Additional error-dependent structured data containing more information about an error

___errorCode.description: An integer indicating the type of error. 0 means success (no error)

___errorMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the error.

InstallationParam.description: Installation parameters provided for a CBSD

___antennaAzimuth.description: Heading of antenna azimuth relative to true north, provided in decimal degrees. Positive indicates easterly.

___antennaGain.description: Maximum gain in dB of the antenna along the boresight

___indoorDeployment.description: True if the equipment is installed indoors, false if outdoors

___longitude.description: Longitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___verticalAccuracy.description: A measurement in meters of the vertical accuracy of the indicated location.

___antennaDowntiltElec.description: Electrical tilt of the antenna (vertically down is positive) in decimal degrees.

___antennaBeamwidth.description: Beamwidth to 3dB points of the antenna coverage pattern, provided in decimal degrees and measured at the horizon.

___latitude.description: Latitude in WGS84 coordinates, provided in decimal degrees

___height.description: Height above ground level, provided in meters

___horizontalAccuracy.description: A measurement in meters of the horizontal accuracy of the indicated location.

___antennaDowntiltMech.description: Mechanical tilt of the antenna (vertically down is positive) in decimal degrees.

___antennaModel.description: If an external antenna is used, the model of the antenna is optionally provided in this field.

___heightType.description: The reference for the height parameter. AMSL indicates the height is measured relative to mean sea level. AGL indicates the height is measured relative to local ground level at latitude, longitude.

RegistrationResponse.description: Registration response parameters returned to a CBSD

___cbsdId.description: Globally unique string generated by the SAS which identifies this CBSD.

___errorData.description: Additional error-dependent structured data containing more information about an error

___errorCode.description: An integer indicating the type of error. 0 means success (no error)

___errorMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the error.

RelinquishmentResponse.description: Relinquishment response provided to a CBSD

___grantId.description: Unique designator for the grant as provided in the relinquishment request.

___cbsdId.description: Unique designator for the CBSD as provided in the relinquishment request.

___errorData.description: Additional error-dependent structured data containing more information about an error

___errorCode.description: An integer indicating the type of error. 0 means success (no error)

___errorMessage.description: A detailed human-readable string describing the error.
